class.name: IsoPlot
class.documentation: This object contains all the attributes of the isolines

parameter.name: contour_special_legend
parameter.documentation: Used in wrep to produce special legend such as spaghetti!

parameter.name: contour_internal_reduction_factor
parameter.documentation: Internal factor for contouring

parameter.name: contour_internal_technique
parameter.documentation: Internal technique for contouring : interpolate/nearest

parameter.name: contour_legend_text
parameter.documentation: Text to be used in legend

parameter.name: contour_line_style
parameter.documentation: Style of contour line

parameter.name: contour_line_thickness
parameter.documentation: Thickness of contour line

parameter.name: contour_line_colour_rainbow
parameter.documentation: if On, rainbow colouring method will be used.

parameter.name: contour_line_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of contour line

parameter.name: contour_line_colour_rainbow_method
parameter.documentation: Method of generating the colours for isoline

parameter.name: contour_line_colour_rainbow_max_level_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour to be used for the max level

parameter.name: contour_line_colour_rainbow_min_level_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour to be used for the mainlevel

parameter.name: contour_line_colour_rainbow_direction
parameter.documentation: Direction of colour sequencing for colouring

parameter.name: contour_line_colour_rainbow_colour_list
parameter.documentation: List of colours to be used in rainbow isolines

parameter.name: contour_line_colour_rainbow_colour_list_policy
parameter.documentation: What to do if the list of colours is smaller that the list of contour: lastone/cycle

parameter.name: contour_line_thickess_rainbow_list
parameter.documentation: List of thickness to used when rainbow method is on

parameter.name: contour_line_thickness_rainbow_list_policy
parameter.documentation: What to do if the list of thickness is smaller that the list of contour: lastone/cycle

parameter.name: contour_line_style_rainbow_list
parameter.documentation: List of line style to used when rainbow method is on

parameter.name: contour_line_style_rainbow_list_policy
parameter.documentation: What to do if the list of line styles is smaller that the list of contour: lastone/cycle

parameter.name: contour_highlight
parameter.documentation: Plot contour highlights (ON/OFF)
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_highlight sent to new Magics[IsoPlot].

parameter.name: contour_level_selection_type
parameter.documentation: count: calculate a reasonable contour interval taking into account the min/max and the requested number of isolines. interval: regularly spaced intervals using the reference_level as base. level_list: uses the given list of levels.

parameter.name: contour_label
parameter.documentation: Plot labels on contour lines
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter Contour sent to new Magics[Contour].

parameter.name: contour_shade
parameter.documentation: Turn shading on
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_label sent to new Magics[Contour].

parameter.name: contour_legend_only
parameter.documentation: Inform the contour object do generate only the legend and not the plot!
